text: Dejan Stamenković (; born 8 August 1990) is a Serbian football midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Niš Category:Association football defenders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Sinđelić Niš players Category:FK Srem players Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Serbian expatriates in Albania Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania
title: Dejan Stamenković (footballer, born 1990)
